required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of TL117 in Patients With Recurrent or Metastatic Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I/II Study of the PI3K Inhibitor TL117 Alone and in Combination With Paclitaxel in Patients With Relapsed/Metastatic Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, pharmacokinetic and efficacy of TL117 plus paclitaxel in patients with recurrent or metastatic head and neck cancer.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a Phase 1/2 open label, single arm study, and is divided into three phases: the single-agent dose-escalation phase Ia trial, the TL117 plus paclitaxel dose-escalation phase Ib trial, and the open label, multicenter phase 2 trial of TL117 plus paclitaxel.
Adverse events and dose limiting toxicities will be assessed from the first dose of study drug though day 28. When the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of TL117 plus paclitaxel is determined, additional patients will be treated at the defined RP2D dose until occurrence of unacceptable toxicity, disease progression or withdrawal of consent or death.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase Ia -Dose Limiting Toxicity (DLT) of TL117 treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time of the first dosing to time of Cycle 1 Day 28（each cycle is 28 days）
primary_outcome.description: Per DLT criteria as defined in protocol

primary_outcome.measure: Phase Ib -Dose Limiting Toxicity (DLT) of TL117 plus paclitaxel combination treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time of the first dosing to time of Cycle 1 Day 28（each cycle is 28 days）
primary_outcome.description: Per DLT criteria as defined in protocol

primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 8 weeks from date of first treatment until date of last treatment up to 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Objective response rate (ORR): percentage of patients with best overall response of complete response (CR) and partial response (PR) according to RECIST v1.1.

clinical_study.condition: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

arm_group.description: Phase 1a: All subjects receiving TL117 alone (20-120 mg); Phase 1b: All subjects receiving TL117 (MTD-1 or MTD) plus Paclitaxel; Phase 2: All subjects receiving TL117 in combination with Paclitaxel at RP2D

intervention.description: Paclitaxel (80 mg/m2) administered intravenously (IV) on Days 1, 8, and 15 of a 28-day treatment cycle.

condition_browse.mesh_term: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head and Neck
